Class StringSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fwdekker.randomness.Settings
      • com.fwdekker.randomness.string.StringSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intellij.openapi.components.ApplicationComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.BaseComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.NamedComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<StringSettings>

    public final class StringSettings
extends Settings
implements com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<StringSettings>
    Contains settings for generating random strings.
